recipesJson.name: Cranberry Thumbprint | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
It's getting to be that time of the year when you start to see holiday themed recipes.  So, to kick off the upcoming season we created a Cranberry Thumbprint.   This is a shortbread cookie infused with an almond essence and topped with just a "thumbprint" of  cranberry jam.  Super simple profile, but intricately designed.  See the full Episode and flavor notes at https://youtu.be/SWQWyL6KjFE .

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://imgur.com/LA0lhIG.png)

reviews.text: Only 2 day steep but it's good! Real good. Perfect for the season. The bakery notes from the cookie help compliment the dark cranberry jammy notes. Im sure after more steep the flavors will develop even more. Thanks for sharing.
You have to mix this. Just mix it. This stuff will make you happy, it made me very happy. Just mix it
